summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating design, construction, use and occupancy of buildings, amending Sections 302, 5213, 5215 and 5708 of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500); repealing Sections 2601 to 2630 inclusive thereof and adding, in lieu of those repealed, new sections thereto designated 2601 to 2647 inclusive, and further adding new sections thereto designated Sections 5220 to 5227 inclusive and 5708-B.
